faq_seo_title: Frequently Asked Questions - Stocknear Help Center
faq_seo_description: Get answers to common questions about Stocknear's stock analysis platform. Find help with features, subscriptions, data sources, technical analysis tools, and investment research capabilities.
faq_q1_title: 1. Is there a guide on how to use Stocknear's features?
faq_q1_answer: Yes! We've created the {learningCenterLink} to explain each feature in detailâ€”what it does, how to integrate it into your strategies, and its market impact. We update it regularly, so check back often for new content.
faq_q2_title: 2. How long does it take to see earnings releases?
faq_q2_answer: Earnings reports are available on Stocknear within 1-5 minutes after they go live.
faq_q3_title: 3. Why is your data different from other finance sites?
faq_q3_answer_1: Like other platforms, we source data from third-party providers. With thousands of stocks and funds worldwide, manual data collection is impractical.
faq_q3_answer_2: Data providers rely on automated methods, which can lead to variations between platforms. Differences in definitions and collection techniques can cause slight discrepancies.
faq_q3_answer_3: If you notice an inaccuracy, please contact us at {email}.
faq_q4_title: 4. Is the Options data real-time or delayed?
faq_q4_answer: Our {optionsFlowLink} feature provides real-time options data from Benzinga without delays.
faq_q5_title: 5. Why do other platforms show options data that Stocknear doesn't?
faq_q5_answer: We focus on unusual options activity from hedge funds and institutional traders. Retail investor contracts are excluded to eliminate noise and highlight significant market moves.
faq_q6_title: 6. Is Dark Pool data real-time or delayed?
faq_q6_answer: Dark Pool data is delayed by 15 minutes. We partner with major exchanges to provide exclusive Wall Street insights typically reserved for institutional traders.
faq_q7_title: 7. I found an error in the data. What should I do?
faq_q7_answer_1: Please email {email}, and we'll investigate immediately.
faq_q7_answer_2: We manually verify every error report and work with data providers to ensure corrections are made at the source.
faq_q8_title: 8. Can I request new features? How can I contact you?
faq_q8_answer: Absolutely! Email us or join our {discordLink} for quicker responses from our dev team. We're always open to new ideas to improve the platform.
faq_q9_answer: Not at the moment. We license data from third-party providers and don't have redistribution rights. However, we plan to offer an API in the future.
faq_sidebar_pro_desc: Upgrade now for unlimited access to all data, tools and no ads.
